Studies done by an online dating site OkCupid...
...show that racial preference has polarized Asians.
Asian men are nearly always the least preferred by women from all other races.
Asian women, they're nearly always the most wanted by men from all races.
So, I tried to verify this data, as I'm an engineer, by joining online dating myself.
And I got absolutely zero response from Dutch women.
I think I should have photoshopped my picture even more.
